cr.title: Supporting the Goals and Ideals of National Mentoring Month 2007
cr.excerpt: Mr. Speaker, on that I demand the yeas and nays.

cr.title: Honoring the First Responders and Supporting the Victims of The Southern California Wildfires
cr.excerpt: Mr. Speaker, Kurt Vonnegut once said, "I can think of no more stirring symbol of man's humanity to man than a fire engine," and I agree. Last week, my district in San Diego bore witness to extraordinary displays of humanity and resiliency as wildfires swept through our region. We owe a debt of gratitude to the firefighters, National Guard...

cr.title: Honorable Stephanie Tubbs Jones College Fire Prevention Act
cr.excerpt: Mr. Speaker, we come on the floor once again to honor the life and work of the late Stephanie Tubbs Jones, and we do that with this bill, very important bill, H.R. 642, the College Fire Prevention Act. I'm delighted that Mr. Clyburn was able to be here and to continue her legacy in this way. Mr. Speaker, I yield back the balance of my time.

cr.title: Veteran Voting Support Act
cr.excerpt: Mr. Speaker, I urge passage of the legislation, and I yield back the balance of my time.

cr.title: Expressing the Condolences of The House of Representatives on The Death of The Honorable Jo Ann Davis, a Representative of The Commonwealth of Virginia
cr.excerpt: I want to thank my colleagues from Virginia for having this time set aside for all of us to come to the floor today and express our real sadness in losing our friend, JO ANN DAVIS. Mr. Speaker, in many ways JO ANN was not just my friend, but in some ways my sister here. I came to the Congress in 2001 with JO ANN; and at the beginning...

cr.title: Civil Rights History Project Act of 2008
cr.excerpt: I yield back the balance of my time.

cr.title: Iraq War Resolution
cr.topics: Iraq War Resolution: LEGISLATIVE PROGRAM, PARLIAMENTARY INQUIRY
cr.excerpt: Mr. Speaker, I thank my colleague for that, I thank the entire body, and I thank you. Mr. Speaker, I reserve the balance of my time.

cr.title: Supporting the Goals and Ideals of National Mentoring Month
cr.excerpt: Madam Speaker, I rise today in strong support of House Resolution 908. I want to thank my colleague from Minnesota for sponsoring this important resolution. I want to share with you an inspirational story about a young man from my district in San Diego. Eduardo Corona was only in the ninth grade when he got into trouble with the law....

cr.title: Elementary and Secondary Education Hurricane Recovery Relief
cr.excerpt: Mr. Speaker, I urge the adoption of H.R. 6890, and I yield back the balance of my time.

cr.title: Iraq War Resolution
cr.excerpt: Mr. Speaker, I rise today in support of our extraordinary troops and oppose sending over 20,000 additional U.S. forces into the middle of Iraq's violent sectarian conflict. I oppose the President's plan because it will not end the insurgency, halt military activity, or accelerate our departure from Iraq. The plan is not a strategic change....

cr.title: Congratulating Illinois State University
cr.excerpt: Mr. Speaker, on that I demand the yeas and nays.

cr.title: Commending the University of Nebraska-Lincoln Volleyball Team For Winning Ncaa Division I Women's Volleyball Championship
cr.excerpt: Mr. Speaker, I am just going to close on this resolution and thank my colleagues for bringing it to the floor. This is House Resolution 99, which commends the University of Nebraska-Lincoln volleyball team for winning the NCAA Division I women's volleyball championship. It has been fun for me to listen to my colleagues as they commend this...

cr.title: Recognizing the African American Spiritual As a National Treasure
cr.excerpt: Mr. Speaker, on that I demand the yeas and nays.

cr.title: Supporting the Goals of The National Learn and Serve Challenge
cr.excerpt: Mr. Speaker, I urge the adoption of this resolution, and I yield back the balance of my time.
